cgcloud__Tactic_Template_Cond_Creation_D.name: cgcloud__Tactic_Template_Cond_Creation_Def__c
cgcloud__Tactic_Template_Cond_Creation_D.description: Contains the configuration of condition creation definitions that will be generated for the related tactic.

cgcloud__Additional_KPI_Definition_1__c.description: Additional value that will be stored with the condition.

cgcloud__Additional_KPI_Definition_2__c.description: Additional value that will be stored with the condition.

cgcloud__Additional_KPI_Definition_3__c.description: Additional value that will be stored with the condition.

cgcloud__Allowed_Product_Levels__c.description: Defines the eligible product levels when determining automatically the product levels on condition. Set only when product level defined in TTCCD is empty.

cgcloud__Change_Rule__c.description: Defines the rule to handle past conditions.

cgcloud__Check_For_Duplicates__c.description: Defines whether the system reports generated internal conditions conflicting with pre-existing conditions.

cgcloud__Product_Level__c.description: Defines the product level at which the condition is created.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the Tactic Template Condition Creation Definition related list record.

cgcloud__Source_Kpi_Definition__c.description: Defines the KPI used to generate conditions.

cgcloud__Targets__c.description: Defines in which tables the conditions are generated.

cgcloud__Unique_Measure_Code__c.description: This is a helper field which is used to ensure that a measure code can only be assigned once to a TCCD of a tactic template. TacticTemplate.Id|MeasureCode, where Measure code is either directly assigned to the rule or the editable measure code of the source KPI definition as fallback.
